questions.question: A large e-commerce company is using Amazon Fraud Detector to prevent fraudulent account signups. The company wants to automate the detection process using machine learning models and receive fraud scores in real-time. What steps should the company take to implement this solution efficiently? (Choose TWO)
options: Ingest historical data such as past account signups and user details to train the Amazon Fraud Detector model
Use Amazon Personalize to generate fraud scores based on user interaction data and account creation activities
Set up Amazon Fraud Detector to automatically extract relevant features, such as user location and device type, for model training
Deploy AWS Glue to periodically retrain the fraud detection model on newly ingested data
Use Amazon Fraud Detector to assign a fraud score in real-time, allowing the company to take immediate actions based on the score
correct_answers: Ingest historical data such as past account signups and user details to train the Amazon Fraud Detector model
Use Amazon Fraud Detector to assign a fraud score in real-time, allowing the company to take immediate actions based on the score
